title: Outdoor Movie Theater, Translation Service Available, Fitness Center
posting_body: Driftwood Apartments offers studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes in Kent, Washington, just minutes from entertainment and dining options at Kent Station.
Our apartments include in-unit washer and dryers, walk in closets, outdoor patios, and fully equipped kitchens.
The recreation options at Driftwood are endless with an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, playground, human foosball, outdoor movie theatre, soccer field and more!
Driftwood Apartments is a pet friendly community and welcomes both cats and dogs.
Find the floor plan that’s right for you and schedule a tour today!
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
